parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description:
The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request.

You can use the client to generate the value, but you must make sure that it is unique among all requests. ClientToken can contain only ASCII characters.

>  If you do not specify this parameter, **ClientToken** is set to the value of **RequestId**. The value of **RequestId** for each API request may be different.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the network instance that you want to query.

parameters.name: InstanceType
parameters.description:
The type of the network instance. Valid values:

*   **VPC**
*   **VBR**
*   **CCN**

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Maximum value: **50**. Default value: **10**.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the network instance that you want to query.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group to which the network instance belongs.
